data.title: 10 movie adventure pack. Vol. 2
data.meta_description: Red fury: A lost 10-year-old Indian boy thrust into the bigotry of a white community early in the 20th century finds friendship with a neglectful rancher, a school teacher, and a wild stallion -- Captain Johnno : A frustrated deaf boy sets sail for a deserted island -- Lost in the barrens: an orphaned teen and a young tribal hunter get lost in the wilderness -- Rugged gold: Rugged Gold follows a widow's courageous journey in the Alaskan wilderness -- White fang : The wild adventures of a boy and his loyal wolf-dog
